name: Blink
effects: Teleport forward ~4 meters, passing through enemies to reposition or evade hits.
description: Harness sacred energy to instantly dash forward.

name: Channel
effects: Sacrifice a small amount of health to gain +2 Focus while channeling.
description: Converts health into raw focus by drawing in sacred energy.

name: Cold Enchantment
effects: Imbues your weapon with cold damage, slowing struck enemies.
description: Coats your weapon with frost to chill foes.

name: Cold Resistance
effects: +25% Ice Resistance for 120 seconds.
description: Fortifies you against cold-based attacks.

name: Damage Surge
effects: +20% overall damage dealt for 120 seconds.
description: Temporarily amplifies your attack power.

name: Electric Enchantment
effects: Imbues your weapon with lightning damage that can shock foes.
description: Charges weapon strikes with electricity.

name: Electric Resistance
effects: +25% Lightning Resistance for 120 seconds.
description: Enhances protection against lightning and shock.

name: Focus Halo
effects: +100 maximum Focus for 120 seconds.
description: Temporarily increases your focus pool to fuel more spells.

name: Heal
effects: Restores 40 Health instantly.
description: Spend focus to mend wounds on demand.

name: Heal Aura
effects: Converts focus into +2 Health per pulse while channeling a healing field.
description: Creates a restorative aura that heals you over time.

name: Heat Enchantment
effects: Adds fire damage to weapon attacks, scorching enemies.
description: Envelops your weapon in flames.

name: Heat Resistance
effects: +25% Fire Resistance for 120 seconds.
description: Reduces incoming fire and heat damage.

name: Illuminate
effects: Summons a light that follows you, revealing dark areas.
description: Creates a mobile light source to explore gloomy spaces.

name: Plague Enchantment
effects: Adds plague damage build-up to weapon strikes.
description: Coats your weapon in a virulent affliction.

name: Plague Resistance
effects: +25% Plague Resistance for 120 seconds.
description: Mitigates toxin and plague-based damage.

name: Poise Shield
effects: +200% Poise for 120 seconds, greatly reducing stagger.
description: Bolsters your stability against incoming blows.

name: Pulse of Health
effects: +25 flat Health instantly and +20% max Health for 120 seconds.
description: Restores health and temporarily increases your maximum vitality.

name: Repair
effects: Restores 25 Durability to equipped items.
description: Channels energy to repair and maintain your gear mid-mission.

name: Return
effects: Fast travel to any unlocked Cerim Whisper.
description: Instantly warp back to a discovered waypoint.

name: Scream
effects: Unleashes a cone shout dealing physical damage, +300% kickback, knocks down enemies up to 6m when charged.
description: Projects a staggering roar that topples foes.

name: Stamina Wellspring
effects: +30% Stamina for 120 seconds.
description: Expands your stamina reserves for more actions.

name: Thorns
effects: +80% Thorns for 120 seconds, reflecting damage to attackers.
description: Creates a retaliatory barrier that punishes hits.
